author: costin
msg: - fixed "chmod" for the released ant 1.0 ( no more warnings ).
- tomcat-compile target with only compilation. This save 1/2 time to compile
( if you do prepare manually ). The old tomcat target will call prepare, then

author: costin
msg: Initial documentation draft, it still needs a lot of work.

author: shemnon
msg: fis BUGTRAQ bug where Too Much Information is provided on a JSP not found

author: craigmcc
msg: Update the "build.bat" file to complain if JAVA_HOME is not set.
Update the README file to indicate that you no longer have to worry about
adding the "tools.jar" file to your classpath to build Tomcat -- both
"build.bat" and "build.sh" do this for you automatically.
